caption.p: The effect of temperature (27 and 30°C) and elevated CO 2 (405 and 930 μatm) on the interaction between dottyback predator ( P. fuscus) and its damselfish prey ( P. wardi); ( a) capture success, ( b) predation rate, ( c) prey reaction distance, ( d) escape distance and ( e) escape speed [modified version from Allan et al. (2017) ].
